form.label: 006-R1.5 - Physical Security Incident Response
form.description: Issue an alarm or alert in response to detected unauthorized access through a physical access point into a Physical Security Perimeter to the personnel identified in the BES Cyber Security Incident response plan within 15 minutes of detection.

search.query: | inputlookup cip_pra_completion_records | eval certification_date=strptime(completion_date, "%m/%d/%Y") | eval years_since_completion=(now() - certification_date)/60/60/24/365 | eval is_overdue=if(years_since_completion >= 7, "Out of Compliance", if(years_since_completion >= 6, "Needs PRA", "Completed")) | eval urgency=CASE( is_overdue="Out of Compliance", 0, is_overdue="Needs PRA", 1, 1=1, 10) | sort urgency

| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | `get_cip_asset_type(classification, cip_asset_type)` | search `get_high_medium_cip_assets(classification)` cip_asset_type="EACMS" OR cip_asset_type="PCA" | dedup zone sortby zone | fields zone

panel.title: Excessive Failed Badge Reads in 15 Minute Interval (>=15 failures)

search.query: `get_physicalaccess_records` | `get_physical_site_classification(site,location,asset_classification)` | search `get_high_medium_cip_assets(asset_classification)` | eval zone=site | search result=failure $espZone_tok$ | eval Name=user_first." ".user_last | bin _time span=15min | stats count as total_failures by _time,user,site | where total_failures>=15 | rename user as User, site as Site, total_failures as Failures
